item.title: Window Heat INOP Lights – Associated System Inoperative

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided associated window heat system is inoperative.

note.para: Associated Window Heat Switch remains OFF.

numlitem.para: If L1 or R1 window is affected, operations into known or forecast icing conditions is prohibited.

placard.para: Placard appropriate Window Heat Light (P5) "LIGHT INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
